price: 181. Den la medida justa (cuando comercien) y no causen pérdidas a los demás (haciendo trampas).
arabic: ۞ أَوۡفُواْ ٱلۡكَيۡلَ وَلَا تَكُونُواْ مِنَ ٱلۡمُخۡسِرِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: awfū al-kayla walā takūnū mina al-mukh'sirīna
